documents.document:
yeah - i'm outta prison!

well i'm sure ur wanting 2 know where i've been (those who don't know me personally of course) and the truth is i've been in prison. about a month ago a now ex friend of mine accused me of raping her - a total lie of course! anyway the police had to investigate and i've been in prison (actually juvenile detenion centre but prison sounds SO much better) since then. but 2 cut the story short, the police got the tests back a few days ago and it proved that there was now evidence to support her lies. so now i'm free once again and she's inside for wasting police time. fucking bitch - all cos i turned her down but her boyfriend thought she'd been playing around. well the jokes on her now - let's see how she enjoys the next couple of months!

and:

when i got ma penis out, the great wall of china ain't the only man-made object visible from space

if an image of Jesus appeared....

if an image of Jesus appeared on a condom or a contraceptive pill what stance would the Catholic church take. cos they don't like contraception methods so would they recognise it or not?

the impossible question......

what is the impossible question:

where did we come from?
does God exist?
what's the meaning of life?

NO! THE IMPOSSIBLE QUESTION IS THIS:

HOW OLD IS WESLEY SNIPES?

NOBODY KNOWS THE ANSWER - MAYBE WE NEVER WILL........
